document_name: Government Decree No. 2018-263 to operationalise the implementation of the Paris Agreement
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TUN/2018/TUN-2018-12-03-Government Decree No. 2018-263 to operationalise the implementation of the Paris Agreement_1b74121cbc6522538aa016bb682ecb7a.pdf
document_description: This decree establishes a management unit to monitor and coordinate activities relating to the implementation of the Paris Agreement. It defines its missions, its organisation and the modalities of its functioning.
